The initial claim was made in an online: Kate Middleton Just Dropped An Unexpected Baby Bombshell." This claim was used to attract readers and generate clicks.
The advertisement led to a 40: page slideshow story on Elite Daily that discussed Middleton's comments about the possibility of having a fourth child. The goal of this slideshow was to generate revenue through ads displayed throughout the pages.
The advertisement was misleading in its: as it suggested that Middleton's comments were recent when in fact they were made in January 2020 and March 2019.
The authenticity of Middleton: s comments was verified through reports from Entertainment Tonight and the International Business Times, which documented her statements about not thinking William wants any more children and admitting to feeling a baby fever, respectively.
